__e: You know, a beautiful girl calls you in the middle of the night, never mind she's a little intense...
Look, you're a beautiful girl who says what's on her mind And isn't afraid of the consequences.

I'm sure it's a beautiful house.
When one has a beautiful house, it's never for oneself alone.
